name: NEURAL SHOCK (Igor Sidorov)
description:
You are Agent Informant William Smith, chosen by the secret Order to control the forces of the Neural Network, otherwise it will rule the world. You must find out who is behind this.

Harness the power of the neural network.

A very deep plot in one of the best dystopias.

Many types of weapons, from a plasma emitter to an acid pulsar.

The game is maintained by the developer and interesting free DLC will be released soon.

Get the original soundtrack!

https://igor-sidorov4.itch.io/neural-shock-ost

The video game includes all 60+ levels, which will take at least 10 hours to complete.
